BearCharmPedestal.Desc: It's inscribed with little etchings of bears.
BearCharmPedestal.Name: Sacrificial Bowl

CasinoWorkOrderSign.Desc: Who knows where Irkima gets these work orders...
CasinoWorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

CatCharmPedestal.Desc: It's inscribed with little etchings of cats.
CatCharmPedestal.Name: Sacrificial Bowl

Desert1WorkOrderSign.Desc: Gremix has posted some work orders here.
Desert1WorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

EltibuleWorkOrderSign.Desc: Thimble Pete transcribes orders onto papers and sticks them on this board.
EltibuleWorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

FaeRealm1WorkOrderSign.Desc: "Work with the famous Ogamboe the Deal Hunter!"
FaeRealm1WorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

GuildAltar.Desc: Looks like guilds can register here.
GuildAltar.Name: Guild Roster

KurMountainsWorkOrderSign.Desc: Laura Neth keeps track of her recent orders here.
KurMountainsWorkOrderSign.Name: Food Work Orders

NPC_Agrashab.Name: Agrashab
NPC_Agrashab.Location: Crumbling ruins near center of map.

NPC_AgrashabGod.Name: Agrashab
NPC_AgrashabGod.Location: Shrine east of the Fel-Dasculan Ruins.

NPC_Alzaneth.Desc: An elven mage with a quiet intensity, wearing robes adorned with protective sigils. His gaze is focused and contemplative.
NPC_Alzaneth.Name: Alzaneth

NPC_Anaberyl.Desc: A quiet but immensely talented fairy bard, often lost in her music.
NPC_Anaberyl.Name: Anaberyl

NPC_Arlan.Desc: With a frown and a squint.
NPC_Arlan.Name: Arlan

NPC_Ashk.Desc: He's examining a piece of entrail.
NPC_Ashk.Name: Ashk

NPC_AuShin.Desc: A strong deer who looks very relaxed.
NPC_AuShin.Name: Au Shin

NPC_Backfat.Name: Backfat
NPC_Backfat.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Bahdba.Desc: She stares past you, as if she is watching you and many other things all at once.
NPC_Bahdba.Name: Bahdba

NPC_BellemaDeftwhisper.Desc: She's very focused on her crossbows.
NPC_BellemaDeftwhisper.Name: Bellema Deftwhisper

NPC_Bendith.Name: Bendith the Banished
NPC_Bendith.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Blanche.Desc: She hides a smile as she talks with her friend Rita.
NPC_Blanche.Name: Blanche

NPC_Braigon.Desc: He's immaculately dressed, but smells like feet.
NPC_Braigon.Name: Braigon

NPC_ChemistryPlaceholder.Desc: A temporary NPC! He sells chemistry stuff.
NPC_ChemistryPlaceholder.Name: Chemist

NPC_CoreyTheCroaker.Desc: He's laughing and making weird noises.
NPC_CoreyTheCroaker.Name: Corey The Croaker

NPC_Corinth.Desc: An enigmatic figure devoted to the ancient art of augmentation, particularly in empowering musical instruments with mystical properties.
NPC_Corinth.Name: Corinth

NPC_Crall.Name: Engineer Crall
NPC_Crall.Location: Near the southeast corner of the map, in the mountains

NPC_Crelpin.Name: Crelpin

NPC_Crelpin.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_CynthiaRolfe.Desc: A scruffy, no-nonsense woman with a piercing glare, managing the bar with a sharp wit.
NPC_CynthiaRolfe.Name: Cynthia Rolfe

NPC_Daisy.Desc: She smiles nervously at you and then walks on.
NPC_Daisy.Name: Daisy

NPC_Dhakmar.Name: Dhakmar

Preferences.Name: Barrels of Hard Liquor (Aged or Not)

NPC_Dhakmar.Location: The Hostile Area of Rahu City in [[Rahu]]

NPC_DovieDarbie.Desc: Has a cruel look about her
NPC_DovieDarbie.Name: Dovie Darbie

NPC_DrummondStonecurl.Desc: Roasting something over the open fire
NPC_DrummondStonecurl.Name: Drummond Stonecurl

NPC_DukeOfFlapbule.Desc: A Giant Bat with a reduction talisman, pretending to be no more than a friendly, dog-like pet.
NPC_DukeOfFlapbule.Name: Duke of Flapbule

NPC_DyeMonster.Desc: A little automaton loaded with advanced dye recipes.
NPC_DyeMonster.Name: Dye Golem

NPC_DyePlaceholder.Desc: A temporary NPC! He sells dye recipes.
NPC_DyePlaceholder.Name: Dye Maker

NPC_Elaina.Desc: She's looking around nervously, mumbling 'bzz' to herself
NPC_Elaina.Name: Elaina

NPC_Eleme.Desc: He snarls with determination as he studies a map.
NPC_Eleme.Name: Eleme

NPC_Fainor.Desc: He's sweating profusely from the fire, but intensely focused on some sort of potato dish.
NPC_Fainor.Name: Fainor

NPC_Fazzi.Desc: She glares at you with suspicion and hope.
NPC_Fazzi.Name: Fazzi

NPC_Felmer.Name: Felmer
NPC_Felmer.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Flia.Desc: Prim and pleasant. But not too pleasant.
NPC_Flia.Name: Flia

NPC_Floxie.Name: Floxie
NPC_Floxie.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_FransescaMuradrake.Desc: A solemn woman with a haunted look in her eyes, wearing the dark garb of a former necromancer.
NPC_FransescaMuradrake.Name: Fransesca Muradrake

NPC_Furlak.Desc: An older Rakshasa with an angry glare.
NPC_Furlak.Name: Furlak

NPC_GeneralTassadar.Desc: A stern, battle-worn man with a sharp gaze. His uniform is immaculate, reflecting his discipline.
NPC_GeneralTassadar.Name: General Tassadar

NPC_GeorgeMadler.Desc: He looks older than he probably is.
NPC_GeorgeMadler.Name: George Madler

Preferences.Name: Magic Equipment with Animal Handling Prerequisites

NPC_Glajur.Desc: He's studying a dried skull and trying to look nonchalant.
NPC_Glajur.Name: Glajur

NPC_Gorvessa.Desc: She's stirring stew and thinking about something else.
NPC_Gorvessa.Name: Gorvessa

NPC_Gremix.Desc: Taking a break from the forge.
NPC_Gremix.Name: Gremix

NPC_Gretchen.Name: Gretchen Salas

Preferences.Name: Chairs and Other Things To Sit On

NPC_Gretchen.Location: In or Around Eltibule Keep in [[Eltibule]]

NPC_Gribburn.Desc: He's muttering to himself and scheming.
NPC_Gribburn.Name: Gribburn

NPC_Grumthar.Desc: A gruff and irritable troll bard, who begrudgingly shares his music.
NPC_Grumthar.Name: Grumthar

NPC_Gurki.Desc: A scowl dominates her face, overshadowing even her fancy clothes.
NPC_Gurki.Name: Gurki

NPC_GuzorHarrison.Desc: A seasoned Fire Mage with a no-nonsense attitude, always seeking practical applications for his magic.
NPC_GuzorHarrison.Name: Guzor Harrison

NPC_Helena.Desc: She's dirty and annoyed, but she smiles when she catches your eye.
NPC_Helena.Name: Helena Veilmoor

NPC_Hiral.Desc: He is smiling while remembering something fondly.
NPC_Hiral.Name: Hiral

Preferences.Name: New combat textbooks (for any combat skill)

NPC_Hogan.Desc: He's practicing staff fighting, in the yard, by himself.
NPC_Hogan.Name: Hogan

NPC_Ichin.Desc: He smiles and squints at you.
NPC_Ichin.Name: Ichin the Ice Master

NPC_IlvadeleIrasce.Desc: A dignified and insightful elder Council member known for her extensive knowledge of humanity's history and relationship with the arcane.
NPC_IlvadeleIrasce.Name: Ilvadele Irasce

Preferences.Name: Potions that Boost Damage from Specific Skills

NPC_JakeTheBuckler.Desc: A bear of a human with a hearty laugh.
NPC_JakeTheBuckler.Name: Jake the Buckler

NPC_JanetLews.Desc: Older and tired, but not unhappy.
NPC_JanetLews.Name: Janet Lews

NPC_Jara.Desc: Her eyes are wide with fear.
NPC_Jara.Name: Jara

NPC_Jarmanger.Desc: The shrewd and enigmatic leader of the Council, deeply involved in arcane machinations to thwart interdimensional threats.
NPC_Jarmanger.Name: Jarmanger

NPC_JennyFoster.Desc: A friendly and quick-witted server at the Vicious Bat cafe, always ready with a smile and a bit of gossip.
NPC_JennyFoster.Name: Jenny Foster

NPC_Joe.Desc: Always with a smirk of superiority.
NPC_Joe.Name: Joeh

NPC_Jumjab.Desc: He grins at you with a somewhat alarming level of enthusiasm.
NPC_Jumjab.Name: Jumjab

NPC_Jumper.Desc: A strong deer who looks very relaxed.
NPC_Jumper.Name: Jumper

NPC_Kalaba.Desc: He seems proud of his sturdy armor.
NPC_Kalaba.Name: Kalaba

NPC_Kleave.Desc: She is doing something disgusting with a fur.
NPC_Kleave.Name: Kleave

NPC_Kohan.Desc: He grimaces as he works on a weird device.
NPC_Kohan.Name: Kohan

NPC_Lamashu.Desc: She seems oblivious to the snow in her fur.
NPC_Lamashu.Name: Lamashu

NPC_Landri.Desc: She is trying very hard to look nonchalant.
NPC_Landri.Name: Landri the Cold

NPC_Larsan.Desc: He is fascinated by a small ring he's holding.
NPC_Larsan.Name: Larsan

NPC_Lawara.Desc: She seems tired, bored, and dirty.
NPC_Lawara.Name: Lawara

Preferences.Name: Magic Equipment with Animal Handling Prerequisites

NPC_LeonDasterre.Desc: The busy and skeptical head of Tennenbrandt University, dismissive at first but respectful once introduced properly.
NPC_LeonDasterre.Name: Leon Dasterre

NPC_LieutenantGregory.Desc: A disciplined lieutenant with a no-nonsense attitude, tasked with coordinating missions around the capital of Statehelm.
NPC_LieutenantGregory.Name: Lieutenant Gregory

NPC_Makara.Desc: An older Rakshasa, eyes half closed.
NPC_Makara.Name: Makara

NPC_Mandibles.Desc: Did that mantis just wink at you?
NPC_Mandibles.Name: Mandibles

NPC_Marna.Desc: She's selling an eclectic mix of things.
NPC_Marna.Name: Marna

NPC_Melandria.Desc: She looks concerned that you're here.
NPC_Melandria.Name: Melandria

NPC_MidgeTheApothecary.Name: Midge the Apothecary
NPC_MidgeTheApothecary.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Mittens.Desc: She looks out at the landscape worriedly.
NPC_Mittens.Name: Mittens

NPC_MoxWarcut.Desc: A little dour, but not too grumpy.
NPC_MoxWarcut.Name: Mox Warcut

NPC_NelsonBallard.Desc: An older human with a weary but welcoming look.
NPC_NelsonBallard.Name: Nelson Ballard

NPC_Nightshade.Desc: He grins widely, but it's not quite comforting.
NPC_Nightshade.Name: Nightshade

NPC_NoitaTheGreen.Name: Noita the Green
NPC_NoitaTheGreen.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Norbert.Desc: A little sullen, for a pig.
NPC_Norbert.Name: Norbert

NPC_Oritania.Desc: You can tell she's important. Or thinks she is.
NPC_Oritania.Name: Oritania

NPC_OrmondNeth.Desc: A passionate bard, caught between music and magic.
NPC_OrmondNeth.Name: Ormond Neth

NPC_Otis.Desc: Is he angry? Hard to say
NPC_Otis.Name: Otis

NPC_PaulVaughn.Name: Paul Vaughn

NPC_Pegast.Name: Pegast
NPC_Pegast.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Plaudius.Desc: A figure of cold precision, his eyes study you with a depth that feels more scientific than human, as though he's assessing every muscle twitch and flicker of emotion.

NPC_Preta.Desc: She is fussing over papers covered in weird runes.
NPC_Preta.Name: Preta

NPC_Raina.Name: Raina
NPC_Raina.Location: The Fel-Dasculan Ruins in the [[Fae Realm]]

NPC_Rappanel.Desc: He's playing a lute with a far-off look in his eyes.
NPC_Rappanel.Name: Rappanel

NPC_Raul.Desc: Surprisingly graceful for such a large creature.
NPC_Raul.Name: Raul

NPC_Rebeccah.Desc: A mysterious figure at Tennenbrandt University, she communicates through instruments since losing her voice.
NPC_Rebeccah.Name: Rebeccah the Whisperer

NPC_Richter.Desc: He's reading something from a notebook.
NPC_Richter.Name: Richter

NPC_Rita.Desc: Her eyes are bright with excitement as she gossips with Blanche.
NPC_Rita.Name: Rita

NPC_RoshunTheTraitor.Desc: His face curls into a sort of snarl-smile.
NPC_RoshunTheTraitor.Name: Roshun the Traitor

NPC_Rugen.Location: The Hostile Area of Rahu City in [[Rahu]]

Preferences.Name: Magic Equipment with Fire Magic prerequisites

NPC_Sanja.Desc: She glares at you with cunning eyes.
NPC_Sanja.Name: Sanja

NPC_SergeantBrooker.Name: Sergeant Brooker

NPC_SergeantFisk.Name: Sergeant Fisk

NPC_SergeantHughes.Desc: A seasoned sergeant with a solid understanding of close combat, specializing in Sword, Shield, and Unarmed techniques.
NPC_SergeantHughes.Name: Sergeant Hughes

NPC_Serreel.Desc: A gaunt figure draped in dark robes, his eyes hollow yet piercing, as if he sees more than he should—and wishes to see even more.
NPC_Serreel.Name: Serreel

NPC_SieAntry.Desc: She scouts the distance with a grim snarl.
NPC_SieAntry.Name: Sie Antry

NPC_SirCoth.Desc: A frumpy man in resplendent armor.
NPC_SirCoth.Name: Sir Coth

NPC_SirJohnson.Desc: At attention, yet still lost in thought
NPC_SirJohnson.Name: Sir Johnson

NPC_SirTaggart.Desc: His eyes periodically dart to the skies

NPC_Sirine.Desc: She's frowning at some tanning chemicals in a bowl.
NPC_Sirine.Name: Sirine

NPC_SlimOstren.Desc: A jovial man with a mischievous grin, holding a battered horn that he's quick to play during musical gatherings.
NPC_SlimOstren.Name: Slim Ostren

NPC_StablesGolem.Desc: It stares at you without expression
NPC_StablesGolem.Name: Stables Golem

NPC_SuspiciousCow.Name: Suspicious Cow

NPC_Syndra.Name: Syndra

NPC_TerryCollier.Desc: A refined elf with a solemn expression, meticulously arranging jewelry behind the counter.
NPC_TerryCollier.Name: Terry Collier

NPC_TheFloriculturist.Name: The Floriculturist

NPC_Therese.Desc: There's a little bit of dirt on her. How un-elven!

NPC_ThimblePete.Desc: Nice clothes, but a haughty attitude
NPC_ThimblePete.Name: Thimble Pete

NPC_Trekker.Name: Trekker

NPC_Ufkar.Name: Ufkar

NPC_Ukorga.Desc: A little drunk, but in a good mood.

NPC_Uriana.Name: Uriana

NPC_WillemFangblade.Name: Willem Fangblade

NPC_WintriaIrasce.Name: Wintria Irasce

NPC_WynDovaran.Name: Wyn Dovaran

NPC_Yagreet.Desc: A dainty, calm demeanor barely masks her fatigue
NPC_Yagreet.Name: Yagreet

NPC_Yasinda.Desc: She is writing something and looking angry.

NPC_Yetta.Desc: A frazzled elf selling all sorts of junk.

NPC_Zeratak.Desc: This scary bug nods at you in greeting.
NPC_Zeratak.Name: Zeratak

RahuWorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

SerbuleWorkOrderSign.Desc: Traders pin work orders here for industrious craftsmen to fill.
SerbuleWorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

SunValeWorkOrderSign.Desc: Viedesi painstakingly maintains this listing of current work orders.
SunValeWorkOrderSign.Name: Work Orders

VidariaWorkOrderSign.Desc: The City of Statehelm has posted excess work orders here.
